attributes.additional_details:
The media is having too much of an influence on the public, the younger generation in particular. It is beginning to take a toll on peoples lives in such a way that it the media is making decisions for the public ( unknowingly) and for some causes an increase in diseases since the 80's - such as anorexia, bulimia etc due to advertisements (models and celebrities)
do you believe that the media has too much freedom with what they are aloud to publish in todays society?
